name.baseName: Contaminated Cd agricultural soil remediation;Phytoremediation;Sedum plumbizincicola;Monitoring during and after remediation;Soil Sample
农田镉污染土壤;植物修复;伴矿景天;修复后监测;土壤样品

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Collect soil samples for testing to verify the remediation effect.
采集土壤样品进行检测，以验证修复效果。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: There is no clear start time for data collection in the literature, and the start time of the validity period is based on the publication time of the literature
文献中没有明确数据收集的开始时间，以文献发表时间为有效期的开始时间

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Instead of clarifying specific locations, the paper indicated that contaminated agricultural field was located in Southern China.
文献中仅明确指出，污染农田位于中国南方，没有具体给出省市

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: 7 sample per hectare, according to HJ/T 166 ＆GB 15618. In total, 7 times of monitoring is conducted, including 5 times during remediation and 2 times after remediation.
根据HJ/T 166和GB 15618，每公顷7个样品。共监测7次，其中修复期间监测5次，修复后监测2次，共采集土壤样品49个进行分析检测。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process is intended for the application of remediating cadmium (Cd) contaminated agricultural soils using the phytoremediation capabilities of Sedum plumbizincicola. This bioremediation technique is used to reduce the concentration of Cd in the soil, thus making it safer for agricultural use again and protecting the environment. The process includes monitoring both during and after the remediation to ensure the effectiveness of the treatment. It is applicable specifically to contaminated sites in Southern China where the peculiar conditions make Sedum plumbizincicola an appropriate choice for Cd uptake and accumulation.
该工业过程旨在应用伴矿景天(Sedum plumbizincicola)的植物修复能力，对镉(Cd)污染的农业土壤进行修复。此生物修复技术用于降低土壤中Cd的浓度，从而使土壤再次适合农业使用，并保护环境。过程包括修复期间和修复后的监测，以确保治疗效果。它特别适用于中国南方的受污染站点，那里的特定条件使伴矿景天成为吸收和积累Cd的适当选择。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Process inventory data were obtained in accordance with ISO 14040 on LCA.35 Primary data were obtained from site-specific pot experiments, pilot studies, and vendors, which were representative of situations in Southern China. Secondary data were obtained from the Ecoinvent database v2.3, from which processes of the most similar geographic origin and technological factors are selected.
初级数据清单是根据ISO 14040关于LCA.35的规定获得的。基本数据来自特定场地的盆栽实验、中试和供应商处获取，这些数据代表了中国南方的情况。二级数据来自Ecoinvent数据库v2.3，从中选择了地理来源和技术因素最相似的过程。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Jin et al. Integrated Life Cycle Assessment for Sustainable Remediation of Contaminated Agricultural Soil in China. Environ. Sci. Technol. 2021, 55, 17, 12032–12042.
Jin et al. Integrated Life Cycle Assessment for Sustainable Remediation of Contaminated Agricultural Soil in China. Environ. Sci. Technol. 2021, 55, 17, 12032–12042.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), ensure that the specific methodological framework set out in ISO 14040 is followed. Given that the data acquisition did not have a precise starting point, use the publication date of the source literature as the reference for the temporal boundary of the data. Special attention should be paid to the geographic specificity of the data, as the primary data are representative of Southern China conditions. When comparing with other remediation processes, consider the technological applicability, ensuring that similar geographic and technological factors are accounted for. The secondary data should only be used when matching processes of similar geographic origin and technological factors can be ensured from databases such as Ecoinvent. Always consider the methodological advice of including or excluding certain phases depending on the context of the LCA study, particularly monitoring frequency and sampling strategies as indicated in HJ/T 166 and GB 15618.

在使用该数据集进行生命周期评估(LCA)时，确保遵循ISO 14040中规定的特定方法论框架。鉴于数据获取并没有一个准确的起点，使用来源文献的发布日期作为数据的时间边界参考。特别注意数据的地理特定性，因为初级数据代表了中国南方的情况。与其他修复过程比较时，考虑技术适应性，确保考虑了类似的地理和技术因素。仅当可以从Ecoinvent等数据库中确保匹配具有相似地理起源和技术因素的过程时，才使用二级数据。始终根据LCA研究的上下文，特别是按照HJ/T 166和GB 15618指示的监测频率和采样策略，考虑包括或排除某些阶段的方法论建议。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 这里是采集的土壤样品数量，一共采集土壤样品49个，用于实验室检测
